partintro.para: Struts plugin is composed of sample codes to guide how to connect Apache Struts, which is frequently used as the Web framework when JavaEE applications are developed, and Spring and reference libraries necessary to use these open sources.
Install struts plugin by entering the following command in the Command window.
The installation result can be checked by using the installed (mvn anyframe:installed) or the jetty:run(mvn clean jetty:run) commands.

book.part:
Struts
Apache Struts Framework is open-source framework to develop Java web application. Struts helps the development of web application based on Model-View-Controller(MVC) architecture which is one of the separate concerns of software application. Struts provides Controller in ActionServlet format, and provides guidelines to implement view layer using JSP Taglib. Also, in Web Struts of Spring Framework (spring-webmvc-struts.jar), environment to access the interface of business layer registered as Spring Bean in WebApplicationContext of Struts is provided when business layer is composed based on Spring Framework.
The following are the characteristics of Struts.
The roles are clearly separated due to the following MVC architecture.
ActionServlet, which is a controller connecting model and view, executes Action class according to entered HTTP Request, and Action class executes model-related business layer or database logic. Also, ActionForm class for returning data between model and view can be used.
Provides Taglib that conveniently helps view development implemented with JSP.
In Taglib basically provided by Struts, there are Bean, HTML, Logic, and Nested.
Exception Handling is possible by setting configuration.
Exception page can be set according to exception type using exception handling of struts-config.xml.
Authorization is possible by setting QConfiguration.
Can be set for only users that have specific URL authorization and permission, to access related URL.
Validation Check is possible in Controller.
Validation check on user input value can be performed with controller, not view.
Supports internationalization(I18N) function using MessageResource.
Possible to show web page in various languages according to user locale information.
